Body:
""" paragraph """
with open('files/segment_para.txt', 'r') as f:
    text = f.read()
segment = Segment(text)
self.assertEquals(segment.segments, [{'tag': 1002, 'text':
    """This is a first paragraph
and continues to next line."""}, {'tag': 
    1002, 'text': """Then this is the second
paragraph."""}])
